for_sales.sales_text: 2015 Season Ready Yealm Crabber, 21’, lug rigged, glass fibre open boat with centreboard. Built 1980’s by Hockaday Brothers. Included in sale; working and racing sails, all in very good condition, sweeps, anchor, ropes and fenders, battery, electric and manual bilge pumps (both operational). A delight to sail, currently ashore, Leigh-on-Sea, Essex.

boat.full_description: Built in the 1980s by Hockaday Brothers Will'o-the Wisp has been kept at Leigh-on-Sea, Essex, before being sold in 2015 to a new owner in Galway, Ireland.
boat.name: Will'o-the-Wisp
boat.short_description: 21 foot, lug rigged, glass fibre Yealm Crabber, open boat, with a centreboard built by Hockaday Brothers. She is a delight to sail.
